## UKB-WGS DCF I2 vs UKB-GEL NOT I2

```{r, include=FALSE}
gwsig <- -log10(5e-5)

new_path <- "/Users/xiangzhu/Documents/1-Projects/brain2gene/regenie/i2_repeat_20241220_eur"
new_file <- "i2_repeat_20241220_eur_lc_qsm_50th.regenie.gz"

old_path <- "/Users/xiangzhu/Documents/1-Projects/brain2gene/regenie/i2_repeat_2024_wbr"
old_file <- "rickidps_i2_repeat_20241220_wbr_lc_qsm_idps_MNI2006a_50th.regenie.gz"
```

```{r child=file.path(Sys.getenv("HOME"),"GitHub/brain2gene/analysis/compare_gel_wgs.Rmd"), echo=FALSE}
```

### Visualization of comparison

```{r, fig.width=15, fig.height=5, fig.align='center',echo=FALSE}
print(ukbwgs_plot)
print(ukbgel_plot)
```
